text: Falu BK was a bandy club in the town of Falun in Sweden. The men's bandy team played in the Swedish top division in 1934. The men's soccer team played in the Swedish third division during the seasons of 1934-1935 and 1935-1936. The club was one of four clubs who merged to become Falu BS in 1935. == References == Category:1935 disestablishments in Europe Category:Bandy clubs in Sweden Category:Swedish football clubs
title: Falu BK
